motiveVictimGreenInnocent: [Victim] is my personal doctor; he is very ... discrete. | I use- %pardon me,% used him since he could be expedited if needed, and his services are second to none.

motiveVictimBlueGuilty: Unless I am mistaken, [Blue] has an interest in [Yellow]. | Considering the ... looks that [Yellow] has shared with [Victim], I expect [Blue] is a bit jealous.
